summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lumina Photography Platform. Backend APIs are 91.7% functional with minor photo upload issue. Frontend UI and user flows are working well with successful authentication, admin functionality, and user registration/login.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 400 error with 'broken data stream when reading image file'

integration_issues.issue: Event galleries show 0 photos due to backend upload failure

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and navigation
Events page displays public events correctly
Admin dashboard shows stats (events, photos, users, revenue)
Admin can create events with name, date, description, public toggle
Admin clients page shows registered users
Events page shows public events with search functionality
Event gallery page loads and shows event details
Cart page accessible for authenticated users
Purchases page accessible for authenticated users
Protected routes redirect properly when not authenticated
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix photo upload functionality - the backend photo upload endpoint is failing with image processing error. This prevents testing of full photo workflow including cart functionality and Stripe checkout.
